title: Cosa Nostra, 14 12 months sentence for Bonafede. He lent his id to Matteo Messina Denaro –
text:
The Palermo preliminary listening to choose sentenced Andrea Bonafede, the surveyor from Campobello di Mazara who lent his id to Matteo Messina Denaro, to 14 years in jail. The tremendous fugitive was arrested on January 16, 2023 and had Bonafede’s paperwork with him along with his picture. Bonafede was accused of mafia affiliation.
Additionally at present, prosecutors Gianluca De Leo and Pierangelo Padova, of the Palermo district anti-mafia directorate, requested the Gup Paolo Magro for 15 years in jail for Laura Bonafede, a trainer and girl very near the Castelvetrano boss, who died final September, just a few months since his seize, which occurred after thirty years of being on the run. Bonafede, married to a life prisoner and who had a romantic bond with the mafia boss, would have facilitated her escape by offering him with help and canopy, exchanging messages and utilizing encrypted codes. She is the daughter of the boss of Campobello di Mazara (Trapani) and cousin of one in every of Messina Denaro’s frontmen, Andrea Bonafede, of the cousin of the identical identify and of the latter’s brother, Emanuele Bonafede, all concerned within the affair. Initially, the speculation of aggravated aiding and abetting non-compliance with the sentence was formulated in opposition to him, however the contents of the correspondence with the fugitive, discovered within the hideouts utilized by the fugitive, highlighted the function of help that the girl would have ensured for the person with whom she was in love and with whom she had had one of many many relationships Messina Denaro had whereas on the run.
Laura Bonafede has been in jail since April final 12 months and her daughter Martina Gentile is underneath home arrest (as a result of she is the mom of a really younger little one) on expenses of aiding and abetting and procured failure to adjust to the sentence, each aggravated by the facilitation of Cosa Nostra. After the arrest of the previous tremendous fugitive on January 16, 2023, investigators continued to research to reconstruct the community of supporters who contributed to the boss’s fugitive standing. Laura Bonafede and her daughter Martina Gentile would have been a part of the community of supporters who favored her thirty years of hiding. The connection between the 2 would have been confirmed by quite a few pizzini and by the letters that the trainer addressed to Messina Denaro, letters wherein, amongst different issues, she expressed her jealousy in the direction of different ladies. The indictment was concluded with the request for punishment by the deputies Pierangelo Padova and Gianluca De Leo.
